title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees) 

Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 16 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (fees) regulation 2020 (2) regulation come operation 16 december 2020

title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 
“Council Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No 2157/20011 of 8 
October 2001 on the Statute for a European company (SE); 

“electronic form” means in relation to the doing of any act specified in the 
second column to the table of fees set out in the Schedule the doing of that act 
by means of the electronic filing system in use by the Registrar of Companies; 

“paper form” means, in relation to a matter specified in the second column to 
the table of fees set out in the Schedule— 

(a) 

(b) 

the filing of a document or an application in paper form, or 

the inspection of a document or an application submitted in 
paper form, or 

(c) 

the submission of a document in paper form; 

“Regulations of 2007” means the European Communities (European Public 
Limited Liability Company) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 21 of 2007); 

“Societas Europaea” shall be construed 
Regulations of 2007. 

in accordance with the
text_norm: 2 regulations-- act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) council regulation mean council regulation (ec) 2157 20011 8 october 2001 statute european company (se) electronic form mean relation act specified second column table fee set schedule act mean electronic filing system use registrar company paper form mean relation matter specified second column table fee set schedule-- (a) (b) filing document application paper form inspection document application submitted paper form (c) submission document paper form regulation 2007 mean european community (european public limited liability company) regulation 2007 (s.i no 21 2007) societas europaea shall construed regulation 2007 accordance

title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: 3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and
text_raw:
3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and 
fourth columns of the Schedule to these Regulations opposite the mention of 
the matter specified in the second column of the Schedule. 

1 OJ L294, 10.11.2001, p.1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [626] 3
text_norm: 3 fee paid registrar set third fourth column schedule regulation opposite mention matter specified second column schedule 1 oj l294 10.11.2001 p.1 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th december 2020 626 3

title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: 4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of
text_raw:
4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of 
2014 that a company change its name, any fee that would, but for this 
Regulation, be required to be paid in respect of the registration of that change 
shall not be charged, levied or paid.
text_norm: 4 registrar directs pursuant section 30(3)(b) act 2014 company change name fee would regulation required paid respect registration change shall charged levied paid

title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: 5. The Companies Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 213 of
text_raw:
5. The Companies Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 213 of 

2015) are revoked.

title: Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (as adapted by the Business, Enterprise
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a 
legal interpretation.) 

These Regulations set out the fees to be paid to the Registrar of Companies in 
respect of matters under the Companies Act 2014 and revoke the Companies 
Act 2014 (Fees) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 213 of 2015).
